column2: "Hey, <%me>. You've probably taken down a Digg or two, right?"
"Well, it really doesn't matter either way. Just kick some serious ass like you usually do, would you?"
"I'll watch what you do and use it in my next battle. I'll also file the mission report with ARKS."
"Coming back to it, if you think about the raising the power of ARKS as a whole, doesn't it get you excited?"
